name: ``R_co``
meaning: blob-radius for AGNs / width for GRBs

name: ``FRACt``
meaning: fraction of dynamical timescale for timestep

name: ``FRACs``
meaning: escape rate as a fraction of speed of light --> setting it to one means electrons free stream like neutrinos

name: ``p_inj_max``
meaning: does not exist yet (max. Lorentz fractor)

name: ``REG``
meaning: To prevent numerical errors because of zeros
